CustomField.formula: CASE(Tier__c, "1", IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Last_Touch_Point__c)), Last_Touch_Point__c + 90 , DATEVALUE (CreatedDate) + 90), "2", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Last_Touch_Point__c)), Last_Touch_Point__c + 120 , DATEVALUE (CreatedDate) + 120), "3",IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Last_Touch_Point__c)), Last_Touch_Point__c + 180 , DATEVALUE (CreatedDate) + 180),Null)
CustomField.label: Next Touchpoint_Date
